title: 1804 Santa Clara Ave #E - 2 bedroom / 1 bathroom
posting_body: 1804 Santa Clara Ave #E is a updated 2 bedroom, 1 bath apartment with plenty of natural sunlight.
This charming unit features an open floor plan and laminated floor.
Updated Kitchen features beautiful backsplash, gleaming stone countertops & island, and stainless steel appliances.
Coin operated laundry on site and 1 assigned carport parking space.
Property is professionally managed by CZRE
Lease terms: 1 year lease
Rent: $2500
Security Deposit: $3200
Rental fee: One time 30% rental fee paid by tenant
$6.45/month for 12 months  Rent Program Fee (Tenant Responsibility)
Pets negotiable
Tenant pay electric only
1 carport parking space - #1
Coin laundry on-site
Contact the CZRE leasing team to schedule a viewing.
